name: active_release
description: Find all active release features in RHDHPlan
jql_template: project=rhdhplan AND issuetype=feature AND component=release AND status != closed
example: project=rhdhplan AND issuetype=feature AND component=release AND status != closed
notes: Returns release tracking issues with key dates in description

name: open_issues
description: Find all open issues for a specific release version
jql_template: project IN (RHIDP, RHDHBugs, RHDHPLAN, RHDHSUPP) AND fixVersion = "{{RELEASE_VERSION}}" and status != closed
example: project IN (RHIDP, RHDHBugs, RHDHPLAN, RHDHSUPP) AND fixVersion = "1.9.0" and status != closed
notes: Base query for all open issues in a release

name: open_issues_by_type
description: Find open issues for a release filtered by issue type
jql_template: project IN (RHIDP, RHDHBugs, RHDHPLAN, RHDHSUPP) AND fixVersion = "{{RELEASE_VERSION}}" AND status != closed AND issuetype = "{{ISSUE_TYPE}}"
example: project IN (RHIDP, RHDHBugs, RHDHPLAN, RHDHSUPP) AND fixVersion = "1.9.0" AND status != closed AND issuetype = "Bug"
notes: Use with issue types: Feature, Epic, Story, Task, Sub-task, Bug, Vulnerability, Weakness

name: epics
description: Find open EPICs not in Dev Complete or Release Pending
jql_template: project IN (RHIDP) AND fixVersion = "{{RELEASE_VERSION}}" and issuetype = epic and status not in (closed, "Release Pending", "Dev Complete")
example: project IN (RHIDP) AND fixVersion = "1.9.0" and issuetype = epic and status not in (closed, "Release Pending", "Dev Complete")
notes: Identifies EPICs that need attention before release

name: cves
description: Find all CVE issues (vulnerabilities and weaknesses)
jql_template: project IN (RHIDP,rhdhbugs) AND fixVersion = "{{RELEASE_VERSION}}" and issuetype in (weakness, Vulnerability, bug) and summary ~ "CVE*"
example: project IN (RHIDP,rhdhbugs) AND fixVersion = "1.9.0" and issuetype in (weakness, Vulnerability, bug) and summary ~ "CVE*"
notes: Critical for security tracking before release

name: feature_demos
jql_template: project in (RHDHPlan,RHIDP) AND issuetype = feature AND labels = demo AND fixVersion = "{{RELEASE_VERSION}}" AND status != closed
example: project in (RHDHPlan,RHIDP) AND issuetype = feature AND labels = demo AND fixVersion = "1.9.0" AND status != closed

name: feature_subtasks
description: Find feature subtasks for acceptance criteria verification
jql_template: project in (RHDHPlan) AND issuetype = sub-task AND fixVersion = "{{RELEASE_VERSION}}" AND status != closed
example: project in (RHDHPlan) AND issuetype = sub-task AND fixVersion = "1.9.0" AND status != closed
notes: Tracks feature verification and demo creation tasks

name: test_day_features
description: Find features designated for Test Day
jql_template: Project in (RHDHPlan, rhidp) AND issuetype = feature AND labels = rhdh-testday AND fixVersion = "{{RELEASE_VERSION}}" AND status != closed
example: Project in (RHDHPlan, rhidp) AND issuetype = feature AND labels = rhdh-testday AND fixVersion = "1.9.0" AND status != closed
notes: Features ready for Test Day validation

name: features_added_to_release
description: Find features added to release in last 14 days
jql_template: project in (RHDHPlan,rhidp) AND issuetype = feature AND fixVersion = "{{RELEASE_VERSION}}" AND fixversion changed after -14d
example: project in (RHDHPlan,rhidp) AND issuetype = feature AND fixVersion = "1.9.0" AND fixversion changed after -14d

name: release_notes
description: Find issues missing Release Note Type field
jql_template: project in (RHIDP, "Red Hat Developer Hub Bugs", "RHDH Support", rhdhplan) and issuetype in (Feature, bug) and "Release Note Type" is EMPTY and fixVersion = "{{RELEASE_VERSION}}"
example: project in (RHIDP, "Red Hat Developer Hub Bugs", "RHDH Support", rhdhplan) and issuetype in (Feature, bug) and "Release Note Type" is EMPTY and fixVersion = "1.9.0"
notes: Critical for documentation - must be filled before release

name: feature_freeze_issues
description: Find feature work outstanding at Feature Freeze
jql_template: project IN (RHIDP, RHDHBugs, RHDHPLAN, RHDHSUPP) AND fixVersion = "{{RELEASE_VERSION}}" and resolution is EMPTY AND component not in (AI, Build, Certification, "Continuous Improvement", Documentation, Knowledge, Performance, Quality, Quickstart, Release, "RHDH Local", Security, Segment, Serviceability, Support, "Team Operations", "Test Framework", "Test Infrastructure", "Upstream & Community", UX) AND Type not in (Bug, Vulnerability, sub-task) AND status not in ("Dev Complete", "Release Pending", Done, Closed) AND (labels is EMPTY OR labels != stretch-goal)
example: project IN (RHIDP, RHDHBugs, RHDHPLAN, RHDHSUPP) AND fixVersion = "1.9.0" and resolution is EMPTY AND component not in (...) AND Type not in (Bug, Vulnerability, sub-task) AND status not in ("Dev Complete", "Release Pending", Done, Closed) AND (labels is EMPTY OR labels != stretch-goal)
notes: Excludes infrastructure/ops components and bugs. Use for Feature Freeze announcements.

name: code_freeze_issues
description: Find all issues outstanding at Code Freeze
jql_template: project IN (RHIDP, RHDHBugs, RHDHPLAN, RHDHSUPP) AND fixVersion = "{{RELEASE_VERSION}}" and status != closed
example: project IN (RHIDP, RHDHBugs, RHDHPLAN, RHDHSUPP) AND fixVersion = "1.9.0" and status != closed
notes: All open work. Use for Code Freeze announcements.
